author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

An obese man in a Garfield shirt was physically removed from a plane after throwing a toddler-like tantrum, demanding to be allowed to sit in the emergency exit row due to his gluttonous lifestyle.

The best part of the video was when he lay down in the aisle, refusing to move, like a dog on a leash trying to make a point.

NEW: Overweight man wearing a Garfield shirt gets dragged off a plane after demanding he get an emergency exit seat due to his weight.

The definition of a man-child right here.

The man was reportedly from the UK and threw a tantrum on his flight departing
title: Obese man gets dragged off flight after a meltdown over needing the emergency exit row just to fit in his seat

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Many teachers are either woke, radical, stupid, lazy, creepy, or all of the above. However, there is almost always at least one educator in high school who genuinely cares about their students and loves what they do, making them very popular with students.

Matthew Mastronardi is one of those teachers. Yet, for reasons that seem neither logical nor in the best interest of students, his board of education has decided to fire him over words they dislike in classic literature.

Mastronardi read a sentence from To Kill a Mockingbird to his students, which included the n-word. He simply read it aloud because that was the sentence in the book. The story should ha
title: Hundreds Rally Behind Teacher Who Was Fired For Saying The  N-Word While Reading A Literary Classic
